Jessie Ren is inhaling cruffins & designing in San Francisco.

Made in the midwest and sun-ripened on the west coast, I'm a designer who thinks best with her hands. My interests are in illustration, typography, and motion. Right now, I'm doing the 100 day project.

Currently designing at Sequoia, previously at Optimizely. Feel free to reach out or say hello at jessiejren@gmail.com.
